Class Repo

java.lang.Object
ducknetwork.repository.Repo
public class Repo extends Object
Repository layer for DuckSocialNetwork (Lab 2).

Maintains in-memory storage of User entities, provides basic CRUD operations and bidirectional friendship management. Thread-safe via method synchronization.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Repo getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the repository.
      Returns:
      repository singleton

    • addUser

      public User addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the network (if user.getId() is null or already present a new id will be auto-generated). This method also runs username and email validation using Validators.
      Parameters:
      user - user to add; must not be null
      Returns:
      the same User instance with an assigned id
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is null
      DomainExceptions.ValidationException - when validation fails

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(Long id)
      Removes a user by id and clears all bidirectional friendships that reference the removed user.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user to remove
      Throws:
      DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if no user with id exists

    • findById

      public User findById(Long id)
      Find a user by id.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user to find
      Returns:
      the found User
      Throws:
      DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if no user with id exists

    • listAll

      public List<User> listAll()
      List all users in id order.
      Returns:
      list of all users sorted by id

    • addFriend

      public void addFriend(Long id1, Long id2)
      Adds a bidirectional friendship between two existing users.
      Parameters:
      id1 - id of the first user
      id2 - id of the second user
      Throws:
      DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if one or both users are missing

    • removeFriend

      public void removeFriend(Long id1, Long id2)
      Removes a bidirectional friendship between two users.
      Parameters:
      id1 - id of the first user
      id2 - id of the second user
      Throws:
      DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if one or both users are missing

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear the repository (remove all users). Primarily intended for tests.
